testcase.name: verifyAddtoCartProduct

failure.message: The following asserts failed: product Name is Wrong expected [IKALL K475 Smartphone (4GB, 64GB) (Sky Blue)] but found [Tecno Spark 9 (Infinity Black, 6GB RAM,128GB Storage) | 11GB Expandable RAM | Helio G37 Gaming Processor], MRP is wrong expected [9999] but found [8,999], given discount is wrong expected [0] but found [], given discount is wrong expected [6299] but found [8,999]
